short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show amazon product prices without the shipping fee that you pay to amazon as a seller.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This application will show you the price after the 15% seller fee amazon takes after a sale. The seller fee percentage is adjustable and you can change the percentage to your liking. A must have for anyone doing product research on Amazon for dropshipping.
